title: E & A Occupancy + Fire Sprinkler Information (City of San Antonio)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I respectfully request an electronic, parcel-level extract containing current Group E (Educational) and Group A (Assembly) occupancies and associated fire-sprinkler information for all parcels within the jurisdiction: 

Please provide one CSV with the following columns (your native field names are fine):
- Parcel identifier (APN / PIN / BBL)
• Site address (street #, street, city, ZIP)
• Latitude & longitude
• Internal building / permit ID
• Year built
• Floor area (sq ft)
• Number of stories
• Current IBC occupancy code (E, A-1…A-5)
• Occupancy description
• Fire-sprinkler present (Yes / No / Unknown)
• Date of last fire-sprinkler inspection (if tracked)
• Owner name & mailing address (if stored)

If any field is not maintained, please note that rather than withholding the entire record.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

David Cavise

title: Georgia Public Records Act Request: Flock Safety audits and network sharing (Forsyth County Sheriff's Office)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Records related to the department’s Flock Safety system:
1. Organization Audit in Flock.
The report should include data logged from the period of December 1, 2024, to the date this request is processed. Per Flock's documentation, the Organization Audit is available within the Insights tab and is defined as searches done within the agency.

2. Network Audit in Flock.
The report should include data logged from the period of December 1, 2024, to the date this request is processed. Per Flock's documentation, the Network Audit is available within the Insights tab and is defined as searches of the organization’s Flock network by any agency in the Flock System.

3. A list of network share settings that include:
3a. Flock networks shared with me
3b. Flock networks shared with me Devices List (Please see https://cdn.muckrock.com/foia_files/2022/11/17/CPRA_REQUEST.pdf
https://cdn.muckrock.com/foia_files/2022/11/09/1938_001.pdf as examples of the lists from other jurisdictions.
3c. Networks that I’m sharing
3d. A list of agencies in the National Sharing/National Lookup network.

Please provide records in their original electronic, machine readable format. For example, please provide csv or spreadsheet files where applicable. Please do not redirect me to your transparency portal.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Paul Tepper
